typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		state_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		state_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tgt_new.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
